attributes.action: Return Blackpool Illuminations Switch On To A Free Event
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned would like the Blackpool Illuminations Switch On Event to return to a Free Event.
Traditionally the Blackpool Illuminations Switch on was a free event.
For the last couple of years this has been changed to a paid event in which a number of families can no longer afford.
Looking at the low numbers of people that attended this years event this could not have been a success.
LETS GET BLACKPOOL BUSY
